Name: Gold
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Scotch whisky with hints of ripe banana and zesty orange.
Nutrition: One serving of Gold contains 183 calories
